mdRecord.dcterms:title: Patient Record for Haley, David
mdRecord.dcterms:spatial: Queens Co., NY [Queens County, New York]

mdRecord.dcterms:description: Patient Name: Haley, David Patient Age: 22. Marital Status: Single. Diagnosis: Inguinal hernia right side. Received a wound of the scrotum. Result: Being kept in the grand house for 10 days. Mustered out and discharged .
